summary:
A visual enhanced of the 3 summonable Atronachs, altering textures and models for a more immersive experience.
More magma-like Flame, Translucent Ice and More Electric Storm Atronach.
Optional File for resizing them to epic proportions!
descriptionHtml:
I wasn't happy with the original Atronach appereances, so decided to edit the modules and textures to make them look more elemental and intense.

[color=red]Flame Atronach[/color]
Made the flames more intense as the vanilla one, I thought, was too orange and not realistic enough.
Edited the texture so it feels more like it's magma and not gray anymore.
Redid her face so its more vivid while maintaining female attributes.

[color=teal]Frost Atronach[/color]
Some of you might not like my version of my Frost Atronach cause it loses its parallax attribute, but I spent hours editing his textures to make it more crystal like and icey and adding transparency where I saw fit. It makes him look totally different to the original and other mods.

[color=purple]Storm Atronach[/color]
I really hated the clouds emanating from his body so I edited his model and changed to additional lightning.
Changed his texture glow map to be more noticeable and changed the color to purple.
Texture now shows more realstic moss and more realistic rocks under light.


Do notice that Atronach appereances will vary greatly due to lighting (which I think is fun) so I suggest comparing the changes during the day.

Compatibility

It will work with other mods that do not edit Atronach models or textures cause it will replace most of the files.

Optional Files

Massive Atronachs:
Will resize the atronach to the according sizes: Flame x 2, Frost and Storm x 3. This affects ALL summonable Atronachs and also wild Atronachs found in the world.
[right][url=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC575SRgFG-lWvJ-KNBIjYHg/videos][img]http://imgur.com/5H2j1bF.png[/img][/url][/right]
author: Rengel
